verses.verse: And when <S%G3753><s%> they had approached <S%G1448><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> and had come <S%G2064><s%> to Bethphage, <S%G967><s%> to the Mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> disciples, <S%G3101><s%>

saying <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Go <S%G4198><s%> into the village <S%G2968><s%> opposite <S%G2713><s%> you, and immediately <S%G2117><s%> you will find <S%G2147><s%> a donkey <S%G3688><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> [there] and a colt <S%G4454><s%> with her; untie <S%G3089><s%> [them,] and bring <S%G71><s%> [them] to Me.

"And if <S%G1437><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> something <S%G5100><s%> to you, you shall say, <S%G3004><s%> 'The Lord <S%G2962><s%> has <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of them,' and immediately <S%G2117><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> them."

Now <S%G1161><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> took <S%G1096><s%> place <S%G1096><s%> that what <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G3004><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%> might be fulfilled, <S%G4137><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Say <S%G3004><s%> to the daughter <S%G2364><s%> of Zion, <S%G4622><s%> 'Behold <S%G2400><s%> your King <S%G935><s%> is coming <S%G2064><s%> to you, Gentle, <S%G4239><s%> and mounted <S%G1910><s%> on a donkey, <S%G3688><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> on a colt, <S%G4454><s%> the foal <S%G5207><s%> of a beast <S%G5268><s%> of burden. <S%G5268><s%>'"
And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> went <S%G4198><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had directed <S%G4929><s%> them,
and brought <S%G71><s%> the donkey <S%G3688><s%> and the colt, <S%G4454><s%> and laid <S%G2007><s%> on them their garments, <S%G2440><s%> on which <S%G846><s%> He sat. <S%G1940><s%>

And most <S%G4183><s%> of the multitude <S%G3793><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their garments <S%G2440><s%> in the road, <S%G3598><s%> and others <S%G243><s%> were cutting <S%G2875><s%> branches <S%G2798><s%> from the trees, <S%G1186><s%> and spreading <S%G4766><s%> them in the road. <S%G3598><s%>

And the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> going <S%G4254><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> Him, and those <S%G3588><s%> who followed <S%G190><s%> after were crying <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the Son <S%G5207><s%> of David; <S%G7035><s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is He who comes <S%G2064><s%> in the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> in the highest! <S%G5310><s%>"
And when He had entered <S%G1525><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%> was stirred, <S%G4579><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Who <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%>?"
And the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "This <S%G3778><s%> is the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> from Nazareth <S%G3478><s%> in Galilee. <S%G1056><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> the temple <S%G2413><s%> and cast <S%G1544><s%> out all <S%G3956><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> who were buying <S%G59><s%> and selling <S%G4453><s%> in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> and overturned <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the moneychangers <S%G2855><s%> and the seats <S%G2515><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> who were selling <S%G4453><s%> doves. <S%G4058><s%>

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, " It is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'My house <S%G3624><s%> shall be called <S%G2564><s%> a house <S%G3624><s%> of prayer <S%G4335><s%>'; but you are making <S%G4160><s%> it a robbers' den. <S%G4693><s%>"
And [the] blind <S%G5185><s%> and [the] lame <S%G5560><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him in the temple, <S%G2413><s%> and He healed <S%G2323><s%> them.

But when the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes <S%G1122><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> the wonderful <S%G2297><s%> things <S%G2297><s%> that He had done, <S%G4160><s%> and the children <S%G3816><s%> who were crying <S%G2896><s%> out in the temple <S%G2413><s%> and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> to the Son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%>" they became indignant, <S%G23><s%>

and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Do You hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> are saying <S%G3004><s%>?" And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Yes; <S%G3483><s%> have you never <S%G3763><s%> read, <S%G314><s%> 'Out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> of infants <S%G3516><s%> and nursing <S%G2337><s%> babes <S%G2337><s%> Thou hast prepared <S%G2675><s%> praise <S%G136><s%> for Thyself'?"
And He left <S%G2641><s%> them and went <S%G1831><s%> out of the city <S%G4172><s%> to Bethany, <S%G963><s%> and lodged <S%G835><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> in the morning, <S%G4404><s%> when He returned <S%G1877><s%> to the city, <S%G4172><s%> He became hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

And seeing <S%G3708><s%> a lone <S%G1520><s%> fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> by the road, <S%G3598><s%> He came <S%G2064><s%> to it, and found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> on it except <S%G1508><s%> leaves <S%G5444><s%> only; <S%G3440><s%> and He said <S%G3004><s%> to it, "No <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3371><s%> longer <S%G3371><s%> shall there ever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> be [any] fruit <S%G2590><s%> from you." And at once <S%G3916><s%> the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> withered. <S%G3583><s%>

And seeing <S%G3708><s%> [this,] the disciples <S%G3101><s%> marveled, <S%G2296><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> did the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree <S%G4808><s%> wither <S%G3583><s%> at once <S%G3916><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, if <S%G1437><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and do not doubt, <S%G1252><s%> you shall not only <S%G3440><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> was done to the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree, <S%G4808><s%> but even <S%G2579><s%> if <S%G2579><s%> you say <S%G3004><s%> to this <S%G3778><s%> mountain, <S%G3735><s%> 'Be taken <S%G142><s%> up and cast <S%G906><s%> into the sea, <S%G2281><s%>' it shall happen. <S%G1096><s%>
"And all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> in prayer, <S%G4335><s%> believing, <S%G4100><s%> you shall receive. <S%G2983><s%>"

And when He had come <S%G2064><s%> into the temple, <S%G2413><s%> the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the elders <S%G4245><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him as He was teaching, <S%G1321><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "By what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> are You doing <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things, <S%G3778><s%> and who <S%G5101><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> You this <S%G3778><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I will ask <S%G2065><s%> you one <S%G1520><s%> thing <S%G3056><s%> too, <S%G2532><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you tell <S%G3004><s%> Me, I will also <S%G2532><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you by what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

" The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> was from what <S%G4159><s%> [source,] from heaven <S%G3772><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> from men <S%G444><s%>?" And they [began] reasoning <S%G1260><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "If <S%G1437><s%> we say, <S%G3004><s%> 'From heaven, <S%G3772><s%>' He will say <S%G3004><s%> to us, 'Then <S%G3767><s%> why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> did you not believe <S%G4100><s%> him?'

"But if <S%G1437><s%> we say, <S%G3004><s%> 'From men, <S%G444><s%>' we fear <S%G5399><s%> the multitude; <S%G3793><s%> for they all <S%G3956><s%> hold <S%G2192><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> to be a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>"

And answering <S%G611><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> they said, <S%G3004><s%> "We do not know. <S%G3609><s%>" He also <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to them, "Neither <S%G3761><s%> will I tell <S%G3004><s%> you by what <S%G4169><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things. <S%G3778><s%>

"But what <S%G5101><s%> do you think <S%G1380><s%>? A man <S%G444><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> sons, <S%G5043><s%> and he came <S%G4334><s%> to the first <S%G4413><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'Son, <S%G5043><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> work <S%G2038><s%> today <S%G4594><s%> in the vineyard. <S%G290><s%>'
"And he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'I will, sir <S%G2962><s%>'; and he did not go. <S%G565><s%>

"And he came <S%G4334><s%> to the second <S%G1208><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> the same <S%G5615><s%> thing. <S%G5615><s%> But he answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> 'I will <S%G2309><s%> not'; [yet] he afterward <S%G5305><s%> regretted <S%G3338><s%> [it] and went. <S%G565><s%>

"Which <S%G5101><s%> of the two <S%G1417><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of his father <S%G3962><s%>?" They said, <S%G3004><s%> "The latter. <S%G5306><s%>" Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you that the tax-gatherers and harlots <S%G4204><s%> will get <S%G4254><s%> into the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> before <S%G4254><s%> you.

"For John <S%G2491><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> to you in the way <S%G3598><s%> of righteousness <S%G1343><s%> and you did not believe <S%G4100><s%> him; but the tax-gatherers and harlots <S%G4204><s%> did believe <S%G4100><s%> him; and you, seeing <S%G3708><s%> this, did not even <S%G3761><s%> feel <S%G3338><s%> remorse <S%G3338><s%> afterward <S%G5305><s%> so as to believe <S%G4100><s%> him.

"Listen <S%G191><s%> to another <S%G243><s%> parable. <S%G3850><s%> There was a landowner <S%G3617><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> planted <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard <S%G290><s%> and put <S%G4060><s%> a wall <S%G5418><s%> around <S%G4060><s%> it and dug <S%G3736><s%> a wine <S%G3025><s%> press <S%G3025><s%> in it, and built <S%G3618><s%> a tower, <S%G4444><s%> and rented <S%G1554><s%> it out to vine-growers, and went <S%G589><s%> on a journey. <S%G589><s%>

"And when <S%G3753><s%> the harvest <S%G2590><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> approached, <S%G1448><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> his slaves <S%G1401><s%> to the vine-growers to receive <S%G2983><s%> his produce. <S%G2590><s%>

"And the vine-growers took <S%G2983><s%> his slaves <S%G1401><s%> and beat <S%G1194><s%> one, <S%G3739><s%> and killed <S%G615><s%> another, <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1161><s%> and stoned <S%G3036><s%> a third. <S%G3739><s%>

"Again <S%G3825><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> another <S%G243><s%> group of slaves <S%G1401><s%> larger <S%G4183><s%> than the first; <S%G4413><s%> and they did <S%G4160><s%> the same <S%G5615><s%> thing <S%G5615><s%> to them.
"But afterward <S%G5305><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> his son <S%G5207><s%> to them, saying, <S%G3004><s%> 'They will respect <S%G1788><s%> my son. <S%G5207><s%>'

"But when the vine-growers saw <S%G3708><s%> the son, <S%G5207><s%> they said <S%G3004><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> themselves, <S%G1438><s%> 'This <S%G3778><s%> is the heir; <S%G2818><s%> come, <S%G1205><s%> let us kill <S%G615><s%> him, and seize <S%G2192><s%> his inheritance. <S%G2817><s%>'
"And they took <S%G2983><s%> him, and threw <S%G1544><s%> him out of the vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and killed <S%G615><s%> him.
"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the owner <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> will he do <S%G4160><s%> to those <S%G1565><s%> vine-growers?"

They said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "He will bring <S%G622><s%> those <S%G846><s%> wretches <S%G2556><s%> to a wretched <S%G2560><s%> end, <S%G622><s%> and will rent <S%G1554><s%> out the vineyard <S%G290><s%> to other <S%G243><s%> vine-growers, who <S%G3748><s%> will pay <S%G591><s%> him the proceeds <S%G2590><s%> at the [proper] seasons. <S%G2540><s%>"

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, " Did you never <S%G3763><s%> read <S%G314><s%> in the Scriptures, <S%G1124><s%> 'The stone <S%G3037><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the builders <S%G3618><s%> rejected, <S%G593><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> the chief <S%G2776><s%> corner <S%G1137><s%> [stone;] This <S%G3778><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> about from the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> And it is marvelous <S%G2298><s%> in our eyes <S%G3788><s%>'?

" Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3778><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> will be taken <S%G142><s%> away <S%G142><s%> from you, and be given <S%G1325><s%> to a nation <S%G1484><s%> producing <S%G4160><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of it.

"And he who falls <S%G4098><s%> on this <S%G3778><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> will be broken <S%G4917><s%> to pieces; <S%G4917><s%> but on whomever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> it falls, <S%G4098><s%> it will scatter <S%G3039><s%> him like <S%G3039><s%> dust. <S%G3039><s%>"

And when the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> His parables, <S%G3850><s%> they understood <S%G1097><s%> that He was speaking <S%G3004><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> them.
And when they sought <S%G2212><s%> to seize <S%G2902><s%> Him, they feared <S%G5399><s%> the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G1893><s%> they held <S%G2192><s%> Him to be a prophet. <S%G4396><s%>
